subject: [Radiance-general] Final call for abstracts - eSim 2008
body:
(apologies for cross-postings)



Final call for abstracts - eSim 2008



21-22 May 2008

Qu?bec City, Canada

www.esim.ca



A gentle reminder: the deadline for submitting a paper abstract for eSim 2008 is October 22 - 3 days from now! Just click on the "Call for Abstracts" tab on www.esim.ca <http://www.esim.ca/>



Looking forward to seeing you in Qu?bec!



Conference Chair:

Dr. Denis Bourgeois denis.bourgeois@arc.ulaval.ca



Chair of the Scientific Committee:

Dr. Christoph Reinhart christoph.reinhart@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
